project.name: Anthropic Club at Northeastern - Website
project.description: A three-page website for the Anthropic Club featuring an introduction page mirroring the Claude Builder Club flyer design, an executive board showcase, and a membership form with Google Forms integration.
project.target_audience: Northeastern University students interested in AI, both beginners and experienced coders
project.brand_alignment: Anthropic's approachable, educational, and innovative AI philosophy

color_palette.primary_description: Warm coral/salmon from the flyer - main brand color
color_palette.secondary_description: Deep charcoal for text and contrast elements
color_palette.accent_description: Clean white for backgrounds and text contrast

recommended_option_1.name: Space Grotesk + JetBrains Mono
recommended_option_1.primary_font_description: Modern geometric sans-serif with tech startup vibe, perfect for AI/tech branding
recommended_option_1.secondary_font_description: Clean monospace for code snippets and technical elements
recommended_option_1.why_perfect: Space Grotesk has that modern startup energy while maintaining readability

recommended_option_2.name: Manrope + Fira Code
recommended_option_2.primary_font_description: Rounded, friendly sans-serif with subtle personality - approachable yet professional
recommended_option_2.why_perfect: Manrope's rounded edges match the friendly 'everyone can build' messaging

recommended_option_3.name: Clash Display + IBM Plex Mono
recommended_option_3.primary_font_description: Bold, contemporary display font with unique character - great for headings
recommended_option_3.why_perfect: Clash Display creates visual impact while IBM Plex maintains technical credibility
recommended_option_3.note: Clash Display requires paid license or self-hosting, but creates unique brand identity

safe_modern_option.name: Plus Jakarta Sans + Cascadia Code
safe_modern_option.primary_font_description: Contemporary sans-serif with excellent readability and modern feel
safe_modern_option.secondary_font_description: Microsoft's modern programming font with great ligatures
safe_modern_option.why_perfect: Jakarta Sans is trendy without being too quirky, Cascadia Code is cutting-edge

visual_elements.geometric_patterns: Subtle dot patterns and network nodes inspired by the flyer's background elements
visual_elements.icons: Minimalist line icons with rounded corners, consistent with the flyer's icon style
visual_elements.imagery_style: Clean professional headshots with consistent lighting and backgrounds
visual_elements.borders_corners: 8px border radius for cards and buttons, maintaining modern feel
